text: He rode down to where I was waiting. I was thinking what a skill he had for reading my mind. "This would be as good a place for a hold-up as any," he said, reining in. "Jeannie'll be on that coach, Dan."
handwritten_text: He rode down to where I was waiting. I was thinking what a skill he had for reading my mind. "This would be as good a place for a hold-up as any," he said, reining in. "Jeannie'll be on that coach, Dan."
